document.title: Moving a class
document.paragraph:
1Moving a class To move a class from a cluster to another one, you have to use the
../../reference/50_diagram_tool/00_introduction.xml Diagram tool . First,
../20_browsing/20_viewing_information_about_a_component/10_centering_tools_on_a_component.xml center the tool on the cluster that contains the class you want to move. Then, if the destination cluster is not shown on the diagram,
../../reference/05_general_interface_description/10_general_interface_mechanisms/10_pick_and_drop.xml pick it in the
../../reference/10_browsing_tools/20_cluster_tool/00_introduction.xml cluster tool and drop it in the
../../reference/50_diagram_tool/00_introduction.xml diagram .Once both clusters are displayed, you just have to drag the class to its destination.
See Also
